body:
```
[microbenchmarks] Performance differences noted:
Benchmark                                                                               atm_cas_per_iteration    cpu_time    real_time
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  -----------------------  ----------  -----------
BM_PumpStreamClientToServer<InProcess>/256k                                                                      -10%        -10%
BM_PumpStreamClientToServer<InProcess>/32k                                                                       -13%        -13%
BM_PumpStreamClientToServer<InProcessCHTTP2>/32k                                                                 -7%         -7%
BM_PumpStreamServerToClient<InProcess>/32k                                                                       -6%         -6%
BM_StreamingPingPong<InProcess, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/256k/2                        +6%
BM_StreamingPingPong<InProcess, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/32k/1                                                  +5%         +4%
BM_StreamingPingPong<InProcessCHTTP2, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/256k/2                                           +4%
BM_StreamingPingPong<MinInProcess, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/32k/2                                               +5%         +6%
BM_StreamingPingPongMsgs<InProcess, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/32k                                                +9%         +10%
BM_StreamingPingPongMsgs<MinInProcess, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/32k                                             +8%         +8%
BM_StreamingPingPongWithCoalescingApi<InProcess, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/256k/1/1                              +14%        +14%
BM_StreamingPingPongWithCoalescingApi<InProcess, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/32k/1/1                               +12%        +12%
BM_StreamingPingPongWithCoalescingApi<InProcess, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/32k/2/1                               +8%         +8%
BM_StreamingPingPongWithCoalescingApi<MinInProcess, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/256k/1/1                           +5%         +5%
BM_UnaryPingPong<InProcess, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/0/2M                                                       +11%        +11%
BM_UnaryPingPong<InProcess, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/0/32k                                                                  +4%
BM_UnaryPingPong<InProcess, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/32k/32k                                                    +7%         +7%
BM_UnaryPingPong<MinInProcess, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/32k/32k                                                 +4%         +5%
```
